channel.title: Geek News Central Podcast
channel.description: Geek News Central is where I talk tech for the common man. With a twice weekly tech show covering a wide range of technical issues. One of the Top Tech Podcasts and home of the Author of Podcasting The Do it Yourself Guide. 25,000 plus listeners tune in twice a week!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Tech News for the common Man
channel.itunes:summary: This technology show is hosted by the Author of the first book on Podcasting, and focuses on technology news and covers issues like fair use and consumer rights. Tech news for the common man, join his 10,000+ family of satisfied listeners. Subscribe Today Details Todd Cochrane invites you to be part of his family. Every show is a learning experience covering all things tech so you do not have to. Get his unique perspectives one of the first podcasters his show is a must for every listener.

image.title: The Geek News Central Podcast!
image.description: Talking tech for the common man. With a twice weekly tech show covering a wide range of technical issues. A Top Tech Podcasts and home of the Author of Podcasting The Do it Yourself Guide Visit Geek News Central at geeknewscentral.com
